alt_sgdma_descriptor Struct Reference

Data Fields

Detailed Description

DMA Descriptor See Table 23-9. DMA Descriptor Structure of chapiter 23. Scatter-Gather DMA Controller Core or Table 2-1: DMA Descriptor Field Description The SGDMA is not yet used SpecsV2

Field Documentation

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::byte_to_transfer

Specifies the number of bytes that are successfully transferred by the core. This field is updated after the core processes a descriptor.

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::dest_addr_h

reserved (padding)

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::dest_addr_l

Specifies the address to which data should be written. This address is set to 0 if the output interface is an Avalon-ST interface.

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::dmaDescField

values of :desc_control desc_status actual_bytes_transferred

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::next_desc_addr_h

reserved (padding)

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::next_desc_addr_l

Specifies the number of bytes to transfer. If this field is 0, the SG-DMA controller core continues transferring data until it encounters an EOP.

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::source_h

reserved (padding)

u32 alt_sgdma_descriptor::source_l

Specifies the address of data to be read. This address is set to 0 if the input interface is an Avalon-ST interface.
